thread.title: Hamilton sees opportunities to overhaul Rosberg and win Russian Grand Prix - Western Telegraph
thread.title_full: Hamilton sees opportunities to overhaul Rosberg and win Russian Grand Prix - Western Telegraph - Discussion on Topix

author: Source: Western Telegraph
title: Hamilton sees opportunities to overhaul Rosberg and win Russian Grand Prix - Western Telegraph
text:
Lewis Hamilton says Sunday's Russian Grand Prix is "still all to play for" despite being denied a half-century of career pole-positions by his title rival Nico Rosberg. Rosberg, who trails his Mercedes team-mate by 48 points with five races remaining, will lead off the field for the second consecutive race after securing his third pole of the season in Sochi on Saturday.
 Western Telegraph.
